mean_cn: n.弯路，绕行之路；  v.绕道，迂回
mean_en: a longer route that you take in order to avoid a problem or to visit a place; a road or route that is used when the usual one is closed
sentence: I had to take a detour to the destination because my usual shortcut was blocked off.
sentence_trans: 我不得不绕路前往目的地，因为我常用的捷径被阻断了。
word_etyma: de加强动作 + tour旋转；迂回 → 转着走 → 迂路；曲折
